revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Horion . . . to . . . his brother (?), greetings. When the pigs have been delivered by the farmers and [l. 5] vine-dressers of the estate, insure that having taking the receipts for me you give receipts to those listed below so that you credit them to the list of revenues. [l. 10] The following are for the past year 20, year 10, year 2 // Moschos for 6 arouras of the water-guarding; 1 pig, for the newly planted vineyard; 1 pig, Euphron; [l. 15] for the mill service,1 pig, for 3 arouras of the water-guarding; and vineyard, 2 pigs, and for the current year 21, year 11, year 3; Moschos for 6 arouras of the water-guarding, 1 pig; for the vineyard, 2 pigs. Helenos for 6 arouras of the water-guarding; [l. 20] 1 pig, for the vineyard, 1 pig, for the mill service; 2 pigs, [[Helenos for 6 arouras of the water-guarding 1 pig]]; for 3 arouras of the water-guarding, 1 pig; for 7 arouras of the water-guarding, 2 pigs; Pauan; for the garden, 1 pig, for the [l. 25] newly planted . . . subject to the 1/6 tax . . .; for the vineyard, 1 pig, also make settlement; for the demosia (= public taxes) on the estate under your supervision. [l. 30] I pray you be well.
